data.what_is:
Enhance brand awareness with a tool that automates boosting of your Facebook and Instagram posts

Boosterberg was created as a tool for internal use to speed up the process of finding the best posts to boost. You don't need a dedicated team to run through posts, you just need our tool.

Features:
- Linked through your Facebook account
- Statistics visible in Meta business manager
- Ability to set up own boosting conditions
- Performance-based conditions
- Time-based conditions (campaign duration)
- Cost-based conditions
- Hashtag-based conditions 
- text-based conditions
- Ability to create multiple Campaigns and ad sets
- Multiple users management
- Multiple accounts management
-Support via live chat
data.product_description: Online platform for automating the process of boosting Facebook posts along with intelligent data analytics that enables to automatically select the best posts - the posts that are worth boosting them.

initial_reviews.review_title: Perfect for publishers with lots of fan pages
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Boosterberg?
Automation of our posting strategies on Facebook. We just keep posting relevant content as we always have. We then had to manually decide which posts to boost, when and to whom. It was very time consuming and more pages we added, more manual work we generated. With Boosterberg we are leaving boring, yet important work to the robot and everything else happens automagically. Thus we save time of our people and we generate much more clicks.

What do you dislike about Boosterberg?
UI may be bit complicated for the new users.

Recommendations to others considering Boosterberg:
It is amazing tool, if you want to maximize the traffic for your FB budget, this tool is right for you.

What problems is Boosterberg solving and how is that benefiting you?
Right now for our FB budget we are able to get much more clicks. System promotes only the posts with highest engagement. That way FB decreases the price per clicks and we are able to maximize amount of visitors for our budget.

initial_reviews.review_title: Saves plenty of time and nerves
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Boosterberg?
When you set up the rules and boosting criteria, Boosterberg does all boosting for you. So when you manage many Facebook pages and your targeting and boosting criteria do not change from month to month. You can leave it all to this tool because it nicely automatize the bosting.

What do you dislike about Boosterberg?
I had a bit trouble from the beginning to understand how to set up the boosting rules. Definitely, some tutorials would be helpful.

What problems is Boosterberg solving and how is that benefiting you?
Constant post boosting from Facebook business manager or Power editor is very time-consuming. If this can be done automatically then we save plenty of hours. Boosterberg does it. So it is a perfect solution to our challenge.
